panels.title: Number of Allocated GPUs

targets.expr: avg by (jobid,user) (rocm_vram_used_percentage * on (instance) group_left(jobid,user) (count by (instance,jobid,user) (rmsjob_info{jobid=~"^\\d+"}))) / count by (jobid,user) (rocm_vram_used_percentage * on (instance) group_left(jobid,user) (count by (instance,jobid,user) (rmsjob_info{jobid=~"^\\d+"})))

max by (jobid,user) (rocm_vram_used_percentage * on (instance) group_left(jobid,user) (count by (instance,jobid,user) (rmsjob_info{jobid=~"^\\d+"}))) / count by (jobid,user) (rocm_vram_used_percentage * on (instance) group_left(jobid,user) (count by (instance,jobid,user) (rmsjob_info{jobid=~"^\\d+"})))

avg by (jobid,user) (rocm_vram_used_percentage * on (instance) group_left(jobid,user) (count by (instance,jobid,user) (rmsjob_info{jobid=~"^\\d+"}))) / count by (jobid,user) (rocm_vram_used_percentage * on (instance) group_left(jobid,user) (count by (instance,jobid,user) (rmsjob_info{jobid=~"^\\d+"})))

max by (jobid,user) (rocm_vram_used_percentage * on (instance) group_left(jobid,user) (count by (instance,jobid,user) (rmsjob_info{jobid=~"^\\d+"}))) / count by (jobid,user) (rocm_vram_used_percentage * on (instance) group_left(jobid,user) (count by (instance,jobid,user) (rmsjob_info{jobid=~"^\\d+"})))

panels.description: Aggregating all RAS events in each node. Only showing blocks/nodes with errors. A panel with "No data" indicates no errors have been reported during the selected time window.
